audio_description: Welcome, welcome, welcome.
Assalamualaikum. Whenever I share a recipe with Shan mixes, you all really love it. So today, I’ve brought a different recipe from Shan’s biryani range. I’m going to make Shan Sindhi Biryani.

audio_description: Here’s a tip I often share: I cook the chicken covered in intervals. I cover it for a while, then fry it, then cover again. This cooks it well without burning.
